column2: Trim the ends of the Brussels sprouts and cut them in half.
In a large bowl, toss the Brussels sprouts with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, salt,  and black pepper until evenly coated.
Spread the Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the Brussels sprouts are tender and caramelized
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious side dish.
